ðŸ“– Summary: Everwilds is a prototype MMORPG designed as a learning resource. It demonstrates key aspects of MMORPG architecture, particularly networking and player movement synchronization, using techniques similar to those found in World of Warcraft. The project includes a client-server architecture, character movement, combat, leveling, and a chat system.
